website_summaries.verdict: This versatile travel arch has plenty of contrasting black and white patterns to stimulate newborn vision and help little ones focus.
pros: Bold prints and contrasting colors promote visual development
Flexible arch can be attached to bassinets, strollers, car seats or cribs
Overhead design encourages batting, reaching, and grabbing
helping babies hone motor skills and hand-eye coordination
Detachable rattle, teether, squeaky toys can be used independently as babies grow
cons: Not quite long enough to reach across cribs, but can still be installed on the sides
Screw on clamps can be a hassle to fasten and unfasten

customer_reviews.title: Best toy
customer_reviews.text: This is great. I don’t know what I would do with out this toy arch. I actually bought 2 by accident and ended up keeping both. It’s high contrast color is great from newborn and up.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel B

customer_reviews.title: Grandma really likes it
customer_reviews.text: I wanted something to attach to the mini-crib in our guest room for when the grandchildren visit. This is easy to clean, versatile, and worked like a charm.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: Bought for it my baby and you can attach it to pretty much anything with handles. I recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Henry O

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Baby loves it, easy to move from the Snoo to the Rock N Play. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Stacey L M

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Love! After reading so many reviews on several items, I’m glad I went with this one.
customer_reviews.author: Lebrisa Designs

customer_reviews.title: Does not fit standard size cribs but it is a great product for smaller baby products.
customer_reviews.text: This arch is a high quality product and my grand baby loves it! Would highly recommend purchasing to keep your baby entertained. However, it does not fit standard full size cribs. The picture shown is a much smaller crib in which it fits perfectly. It is also great to use on smaller products such as the Rock'n Play, Mamaroo, bassinet, stroller, etc. Wish the manufacturer offered this product also for standard size cribs. I think they could sell a lot of them as there is no other product on the market available.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy A Sloan

customer_reviews.title: The Monkey Plays a some, the Zebra squeaks, & the teddy bear rattles...
customer_reviews.text: Thiis is my Grandsons favorite, He Carries the Monkey in his mouth because he’s teething...
customer_reviews.author: NanaK4Ever

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what we needed!
customer_reviews.text: This arch is fantastic, exactly what we needed it for. The way the claws twist to tighten or loosen is really convenient. I have this over my baby's bassinet, and have fairy lights on one side to help him turn his head to the right in the middle of the night, to help improve his torticollis.
customer_reviews.author: Krista

customer_reviews.title: Perfect entertainment
customer_reviews.text: I’m very happy with this purchase. It’s easy to use. I have used it on my pack n play and the auto rocker. My son (3 1/2 months) loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly with SNOO bassinet
customer_reviews.text: Added this to our baby’s SNOO bassinet. It works perfectly and she loves it! It’s helpful to be able to remove the toys also, it allowed me to help position her head to look left instead of right all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Niki Lazo

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for. I've clipped it on to chairs, crib and rock and play - baby loves it.
customer_reviews.author: keyframe

customer_reviews.title: Couldn't be more pleased.
customer_reviews.text: My baby grandson loves them! He is somewhat cross-eyed, so this has given him something to focus on. These items are well made and very cute. Received the items quickly. Couldn't be more pleased.
customer_reviews.author: R

customer_reviews.title: My son loves it
customer_reviews.text: It's a little smaller than I thought but it works great still. We use it on his fisher price rocker but I also know this will go over his pack and play or crib fine.
customer_reviews.author: Lindzo

customer_reviews.title: Awesome travel accessory!
customer_reviews.text: I love this! It fits on the infant car seat and our travel bounce seat. I LOVE the twist on clamps. It allows you to secure it to any size item. My daughter loves the characters! You can even switch out the characters with other hanging toys.
customer_reviews.author: DMA

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: My baby absolutely loves this! When not asleep he will look up at these toys and play and keep himself entertained! Fits our crib perfectly and easy to adjust!
customer_reviews.author: BritnieHope

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than expected but it actually works perfect. It fits on my sons portacrib and his ...
customer_reviews.text: Smaller than expected but it actually works perfect. It fits on my sons portacrib and his stroller/bucket carseat. Would def recommend this to friends and may be a babyshower gift "go to".
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Product photos are fake
customer_reviews.text: The product shows this arching high over a crib, when in fact it is much shorter, and barely fits across a crib. The product photos show the zebra print portion as three times longer than the green and red, when in fact it's the same length as the green and red. This is blatant false advertising.
customer_reviews.author: Kwillie

customer_reviews.title: Photo is deceptive: not long enough for cribs and pack-n-plays
customer_reviews.text: The play arch is very cute but it is not big enough for a pack-n-play or a standard size crib: the image used is deceptive. The issue is largely that the connection from the arch to the clamps is not flexible and I didn't want to force a bend on these to try it out as it seemed that would damage the piece. Further, doing this would likely make the clamps less strong which would mean that a baby could pull the arch down onto themselves: not good! Clamps would seem to work on a stroller or car seat though I didn't try it: that's really more the size and application that this would be meant for.
customer_reviews.author: A. B.

customer_reviews.title: Deceptive Marketing Photos - Barely fit across pack-n-play with almost zero clearance.
customer_reviews.text: The Bad: The advertising photos show this product somehow arching across a crib. This is terrible photoshop as the baby and crib would have to be significantly and proportionately smaller than real life for any amount of arch. There are 3 hanging toys. One has 3" clearance, one has 1" clearance, and the 3rd hits the mattress. The Good: This is decent quality. The clamps tighten well. This would work really well on a smaller bassinet or carriage. We are keeping as it still sort of works.
customer_reviews.author: Vincent

customer_reviews.title: There’s better toys out there
customer_reviews.text: Not the most amazing toy I’ve purchased but my son already likes some of it so I’m not returning. It’s not long enough for most areas that I want to use it for, but it would probably be good for a stroller. Having said that, I think it may be too high for a stroller. My son can’t reach the toys at his current 3mo of age. I also wish the lion played more than 1 song and maybe played something longer ... he loves it but I have to keep going back to press the song ...
customer_reviews.author: LLama

customer_reviews.title: Great item but does not fit normal size crib
customer_reviews.text: For me this is a pretty good item . I left a star off because it shows a picture of a normal size crib but we have a small portable crib so thankfully it fit (barley).. If you have a portable crib this a cute little touch for it..
customer_reviews.author: tunezia shelton

customer_reviews.title: Baby likes it.
customer_reviews.text: I love the length, I love the toys dangling, I don't love the clamps. For that reason I rate 4 stars instead of 5. It's not a pinch clamp. You have to twist to tighten which makes it not as convenient if you have to quickly get it out of the way. But it does secure tightly so it doesnt fall off if the baby is pulling on it. I would buy it again. My baby likes it.
customer_reviews.author: arlinimartinih

customer_reviews.title: My Daughter Loves This!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this mobile. Especially when we make it play the song or squeak. It is really helping develop her reach and learn to play alone and entertain herself when she is in her crip. Very easy to add and position in different places on the crib. To the vendor, please reach out to me at kokoskouturecloset@gmail.com if you would like to collab on a video product review on my YouTube channel KoKos Kouture Closet. I have some new mom subbies who would be all over this.
customer_reviews.author: KoKo's Kouture Closet

customer_reviews.title: Not advertised correctly in the initial picture.
customer_reviews.text: The only reason I have it three stars is because this product is not advertised correctly. It will not go from one end of a regular sized crib to another. It won’t even work with the halo bassinet. It works for my 4moms & stroller. So if you are buying it strictly for the crib, it will not extend that far. But the quality is not bad.
customer_reviews.author: kristine

customer_reviews.title: 1.5 month old likes it
customer_reviews.text: My baby is getting more interested in things and enjoys scanning this as he’s drifting off to sleep in his halo bassinet. The arch is a perfect size for a bassinet. I like that the toys are removable and can be relocated on the arch depending on how/where it’s being used. Great value. Could do without the song button in the monkey / would prefer a rattle or crinkle over music.
customer_reviews.author: Britt K

customer_reviews.title: Good toy but not very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this for his convertible car seat. The zebra squeaks, the lion rattled and the monkey plays a song and doubles as a teething toy. The only issue I have had is that it is really flimsy where the grippers meet the bar so it doesn’t stay upright.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley55

customer_reviews.title: Nice, easy to use!!
customer_reviews.text: I had an old Fisher price tot-to-infant chair and the toy bar went broke. I try buying a new chair but they are not made with the good quality of the old ones, it was somehow more uncomfortable and my baby hated it. So this toy bar was the perfect solution becuase I could adapted to the old chair and my baby is supper happy. At the same time you can use it in the stroller or many other places. The little toys are nice too and she just love them.
customer_reviews.author: Romina

customer_reviews.title: It's small...
customer_reviews.text: I measured, and the size listed seemed to be ok. However, it's really stretched almost flat across the small Graco pack and play I have. Haven't tried it with my grandbaby in there yet, but it may be so low that it's in his face.
customer_reviews.author: Robboz

customer_reviews.title: Fabric loops on toys are frail
customer_reviews.text: The fabric loop on the monkey head tore very soon after giving it to our 6 month old. Fortunately we were around when it happened so we could cut off the rest of the loop and just let our baby play with the monkey head by itself. We removed the other two in case they were similarly weak. Otherwise this was really nice to put on top of our bassinet to keep baby occupied for a bit.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Widyono

customer_reviews.title: Fun for both of us
customer_reviews.text: My 10 week old loves this toy. I bought it because I wasn’t sure how to play with a 2 month old. I put her in her boppy and hold it at a good distance and she just love to kick and try to grab the animals. It’s so cute to watch her surprise when I squeak the zebra or play the music from the monkey. It clips to her changing table and bassinet really well. I haven’t tried it with her car seat yet but overall we really enjoy this toy:)
customer_reviews.author: Grace

customer_reviews.title: Not for standard cribs - SMALL!
customer_reviews.text: Extremely deceptive pictures. Does not reach across a standard sized crib as shown in the pictures. Guess that’s on me for not reading the negative reviews. Fits great on a stroller or carseat though and my youngest does seem to enjoy it. Just wish it worked well fir her crib that we bought it for.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn S

customer_reviews.title: seize not good
customer_reviews.text: bought it more for his playpen but could only used on items small like car seat, stroller....
customer_reviews.author: rolynda francis

customer_reviews.title: Pictures are deceptive
customer_reviews.text: Like many of the other reviews have mentioned, the picture is deceiving. This is definitely not long enough to go across a a crib. Wasn’t even long enough to extend and go across the bassinet in our pack and play. Other than the length, of the colors and shapes looked nice.
customer_reviews.author: meandmyself

customer_reviews.title: Not long enough for crib!
customer_reviews.text: I do not know why they picture this on a baby’s crib. Very deceiving! It will barely fit a stroller but not any crib or bassinet without being too close to baby’s face! I returned it don’t bother unless you want to use on a stroller or car seat .
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Definitely not as pictured. Barely is half the size stated
customer_reviews.text: This is not as pictured. The size is not correct and is more of a stroller or car seat toy and doesn’t do like the picture shows. You seriously have to stretch it across the crib for it to work. Save your money and go buy some bendable piping at Home Depot and some rings.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Amazing toy and very great for educational convos with my baby
customer_reviews.text: Omg I wish we would have gotten this when my son was a newborn. It is easy to put on bassinets and I am able to put it on his play yard when it is not in the bassenet setting. He started liking it around 2 months ( when we got it). Now he is 3 months and loves to reach for them and kick them. The nice thing is the monkey also plays the song, “ It’s a Small World.” The bananas can be used as teethers. The lion is great for talking about colors and shapes!
customer_reviews.author: Sienna

customer_reviews.title: Very Short...Def Will not fit regular baby crib.
customer_reviews.text: This is so short that iT barely Goes over my pack n play. IT Will be in the baby’s face. Very dispointed. Def Will not fit a regular crib.
customer_reviews.author: cin rn

customer_reviews.title: Play arch
customer_reviews.text: This is very nice, easy to attach to my Nuna playard, Wasn’t sure it would fit, but it did & looks great. It has vibrant colors, baby is very happy looking & interacting with it. Happy with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Pat

customer_reviews.title: This is great for a stroller or swing/bouncer
customer_reviews.text: This is great for a stroller or swing/bouncer. It does not fit across a crib as shown in the photo, but I didn't buy it for the crib so didn't really mind. If you press the monkey, it will play some short songs, but it's not clear how to change the battery on it. My 4.5 month old loves playing with this. The only downside is that it's kind of annoying to take on and off the stroller .
customer_reviews.author: SpaltSh

customer_reviews.title: Great for my infant!
customer_reviews.text: This fits on top of the bassinet, the pack and play, and even around the car seat. It is so easy to travel with and the colors are great for Infants. My baby is three months and he loves to swat at the rattle
customer_reviews.author: Netanya morse

customer_reviews.title: Our baby grandson gives this thumbs up! He loves it!
customer_reviews.text: Our 2 month old grandson loves this! We tend him 5-6 days a week. We put it on the portable crib we have for him and he smiles and gets excited when he sees it. It is well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: SewCrazyNana

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than expected
customer_reviews.text: Hoped that this would fit our Graco pack and play, but it's too short. We ended up still using it on the corner, instead of across. Our baby is intrigued by it and loves the noise each toy makes, so that makes up for the less than perfect fit.
customer_reviews.author: MB

customer_reviews.title: A little short.
customer_reviews.text: This is cute and we made it work but it was a bit short for our crib so it doesn’t make the arch like the picture but it does reach and secured to the crib with a little encouragement
customer_reviews.author: 458services

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: Nice product. We purchased this to hang a mirror from as our son likes to look at himself. It works great with the more narrow cosleepers. I gave it 4 stars because the toys attached to it cannot be removed. I like the option to switch toys out if possible.
customer_reviews.author: Tlt981

customer_reviews.title: Great choice!
customer_reviews.text: My 12 weeks old baby, loves it. She played with it immediately. The arch is not long, so it brings the items close to the baby if mounting it over her. There is music in one of the toys. The toys are also detachable, so you can switch it out if you want.
customer_reviews.author: New mom

customer_reviews.title: Smart buy
customer_reviews.text: I love this !! It’s works on my stroller, high chair, bouncer, and my basinet. The only thing it doesn’t work on is my crib the bars was wider than it stretches ...
customer_reviews.author: MaNnY & JoJo

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!!
customer_reviews.text: I'm editing my review, so sorry I was wrong it DOES fit pack and play! I love it! I discovered trying to put on corner but it stretches big time, across!
customer_reviews.author: susan

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely perfect
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this! I am not sure who loves this more, my baby or myself. It is super colorful and you can add more toys to it if you want. I bought this for traveling purposes to clip onto the car seat and it also came with a travel bag. This is absolutely perfect and I would definitely buy it again or I would buy it for others as a gift!!
customer_reviews.author: Siloex

customer_reviews.title: Yess yess yess
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely wonderful. I seem to be in the car a bunch and I figured this would be great for my growing two month old that is fascinated by everything and is always chewing on something. Worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Joselyn

customer_reviews.title: Too short for a standard crib
customer_reviews.text: The picture is not true, this arch does NOT fit across a standard crib, it’s too short. My boys have also shown zero interest in it, while they do love other toys.
customer_reviews.author: Sofia

customer_reviews.title: Love it, but wish the claws were easier.
customer_reviews.text: It seems to be great quality and my 3 month old loves to lay and look at the toys and tries to reach for them! The only downside is the ends to attach to whatever they are laying in is not easy and requires two hands. You have to spin the piece to make the claw close, it would be easier to just have squeeze clips.
customer_reviews.author: Angel Shaver

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy! Baby loves it.
customer_reviews.text: This thing is great. My three month old loves it. Works great on a mini crib, bassinet, or stroller. Sturdy enough to hang additional toys on too.
customer_reviews.author: robert arias

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: This thing is great! It fits perfectly over a pack n play so she can have some fun in there instead of just laying in it.
customer_reviews.author: Day

customer_reviews.title: Great value and good quality!
customer_reviews.text: I am so pleased with this mobile. It is colorful, well made, and versatile. I have used it on the cradle, crib and stroller. The fact that each part can come off is an additional perk. Baby can hold parts or they can be attached to other things.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth M. Kuck

customer_reviews.title: Great for bassinet!
customer_reviews.text: We love this thing. It fits our co-sleeper and our SNOO bassinet. It’s super portable and entertaining for baby.
customer_reviews.author: alm1985

customer_reviews.title: Does not fit full size cribe!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This will not fit a full size cribe. Picture is very deceiving. I think it is false advertising.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanne M Lyons

customer_reviews.title: Good for baby
customer_reviews.text: Fits virtually any baby item. My son loves it! Monkey plays music! Has a teether and squeaker. You can also take toys off and put your own.
customer_reviews.author: Rosario

customer_reviews.title: The monkey plays music when you push the button inside
customer_reviews.text: So i bought this for my babies crib and she loves it!! It also fits her stroller and a bouncer she has. I really like the variations of colors and sounds. Definitely recommend and also good price.
customer_reviews.author: iliane

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended for babies.
customer_reviews.text: Our baby loves it. It’s def engaging and also mobile so you can switch back in forth depending on position and the type of play. It is actually a purposeful mobile vs the ones that are more for the parents (aesthetes). Our daughter also loves the sound the mine key toy makes as well as the lion rattling.
customer_reviews.author: Velina

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than it looks
customer_reviews.text: It does NOT reach across a pack n play. I don't know how it stretches that far in the picture.
customer_reviews.author: Jill B

customer_reviews.title: Very nice and keeps baby entertained.
customer_reviews.text: This fit on our Pack and Play and entertains baby while she's in it. I recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Azula

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful mobile that can be used in multiple ways
customer_reviews.text: My baby loves this mobile. It’s so easy to move from the bassinet to the bouncy chair and adjust as needed.
customer_reviews.author: N. Christina

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: My baby loves this ! Very useful.. we put it on his high chair and he enjoys it very much! This is his favourite thing
customer_reviews.author: The Collins

customer_reviews.title: Nice but it came ripped
customer_reviews.text: My babe really likes it but it came in the mail ripped. So I don't know how long it's going to last. If it wasn't for the rip I would give it five stars.
customer_reviews.author: candice lumpkin

customer_reviews.title: Cut but too Short
customer_reviews.text: Super cute but too small. I wanted to love this item but I had to return. It’s super short that can’t be used almost with anything. It didn’t fit on the swing neither on the Graco Pack n Play. Basically useless :(
customer_reviews.author: Sisi

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great for thre little one. Very easy to use and attach, very simple.
customer_reviews.author: R. H.

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't fit a mini crib
customer_reviews.text: Super cute - great quality. However not big enough to fit a mini crib. Disappointing
customer_reviews.author: LaurenM

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a bassinet arch/mobile and this fit perfectly for my oversized bassinet
customer_reviews.author: Mz.Yong

customer_reviews.title: Life saver
customer_reviews.text: My daughter has had this a day and she is obsessed she played in her bassinet all night smiling !!!
customer_reviews.author: Savannah Fazende

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.text: I Ordered 2 of these for both of my 6 month and 4 month old grandsons pack n plays. They are awesome each toy makes a sound, one even plays a short musical tune.
customer_reviews.author: JUST ME

customer_reviews.title: Way smaller than shown in their pictures!!
customer_reviews.text: The product pictures are highly misleading. This bar is way far smaller to make a nice arch on a standard crib as shown in their pictures. As a result the toys are hanging very closely to the baby, raising a hazard. Not worth for $23. Does not recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: first buyer

customer_reviews.title: Misleading
customer_reviews.text: The picture for this is VERY misleading. There is no possible way this would stretch across a crib. I honest have no idea what to do with it so it’s just sitting in a spare room.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Schneider

customer_reviews.title: For mini crib
customer_reviews.text: Long enough for a pack and play crib. Will not fit a big crib as soon in pic
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Great arch!
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with the purchase, suitable for absolutely everything: good for the crable, works with crib, on the playpen, on the bouncer, on the stroller. Very cute design, bright and cool toys. Each toy can be cordoned off and given to the baby.
customer_reviews.author: victor

customer_reviews.title: Convenient
customer_reviews.text: This is so awesome to keep a newborn entertained. Great quality for the price and it’s has a just able clasps on the end of it to fit any bassinet or crib. I love that it also comes with a carry case and is portable.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Small and cute
customer_reviews.text: This thing was terribly small at first then fit the crib like a glove :)
customer_reviews.author: Luna Silvestre

customer_reviews.title: Great toy
customer_reviews.text: My little one loves this! One of the best purchases I’ve made. I’ve used it over his pack n play, changing table, bassinet/stroller. He keeps him entertained.
customer_reviews.author: Sue

customer_reviews.title: Length is not sufficient for a crib
customer_reviews.text: It didn't fit a standard crib size, it needs at least couple inches more!
customer_reviews.author: Lio-NJ

customer_reviews.title: Came with scratches
customer_reviews.text: I am very disappointed. It's very colorful and cute. But it arrived with a lot of scratches looks old.
customer_reviews.author: Kainat Arshad

customer_reviews.title: they move very easy.
customer_reviews.text: Very cheap looking, the adjustments things on the sides are hard to tighten and they don’t stay tight after tightening them, they move very easy.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Jean Enser

customer_reviews.title: Too short to fit in pack n play
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item specifically for a pack and play to be able to put it on the side bar of the pack and play. Unfortunately the mobile is too short to reach each corner of it long wise as there is no way for me to screw it on because it’s too short, so I can only use it as an arch
customer_reviews.author: Alida

customer_reviews.title: Misleading photo
customer_reviews.text: Not long enough to stretch across a crib or pack and play. Was able to attach it across a corner of our pack and play but that is the only use I am able to get out of it. I believe it would be long enough to go across most bassinets
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Cash

customer_reviews.title: It ok for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Wish it was longer. Verily fit my pack n play and crib. Fits the stroller and baby swing.
customer_reviews.author: Jack D.

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than pictured
customer_reviews.text: The pictures are very misleading. It can fit over a car seat and still keep the rounded shape. I read the dimensions and thought maybe straight across for the crib but it is not even large enough for that. I will keep for the car seat and rocker by still disappointing
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Gorman

customer_reviews.title: Must have!
customer_reviews.text: My 2 1/2 month old baby girl loves this thing. I bought 2 one for home and one for work and she can spend up to an hr playing and cooing at it.
customer_reviews.author: M. Veronica Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Hangs too low
customer_reviews.text: Based on the picture, I expected the product to be a bit longer. Unfortunately, it is so short, it hangs too low in his crib, which causes my son to get frustrated sometimes.
customer_reviews.author: Linds

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to attach & detach. Toys are very fun. Very colorful.
customer_reviews.author: Nyomi Duenas Field

customer_reviews.title: Baby loves it!!
customer_reviews.text: This toy arch can keep my three month old occupied for 20 minutes! She loves the hanging toys that come with it but it’s great that we can swap them out from time to time with other toys. Absolutely one of the best purchases we’ve made for our little one.
customer_reviews.author: N.D.

customer_reviews.title: Does not fit crib
customer_reviews.text: Does not fit over a standard crib as picture. Cute toys and graphics though.
customer_reviews.author: Jessie A

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the mamaroo
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t like the toy arm on the mamaroo. It was in the kids face and he didn’t enjoy it. This solved that problem instantly! Kid loves it and toys can be removed to clean or use other toys.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Smaller than the photo but just what I wanted it for. Great for chairs or bouncer or something like that. The toys make noises!
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Too short
customer_reviews.text: Very small will not fit a pack n play or crib
customer_reviews.author: LAR

customer_reviews.title: Love how easy it is to move from one place ...
customer_reviews.text: Love how easy it is to move from one place to another. And every piece has a unique sound.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Mendoza

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful toy and baby loves it
customer_reviews.text: Baby loves this toy, we use it on the playpen, crib etc The zebra squeaky noise makes him laugh.
customer_reviews.author: David Ging

customer_reviews.title: Received as used.
customer_reviews.text: The item was used when I received it. I unfortunately traveled and upon return missed the 30 day return time frame.
customer_reviews.author: Belinda Amoako

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift
customer_reviews.text: I got this travel arch as a baby gift for a friend and not only was she thrilled with the gift I felt great giving it.to her. It was good quality, super cute, and useful, and the perfect price!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for pack and play!
customer_reviews.text: Great for pack and play, but wouldn’t fit on my crib. Works in the down post Orion teaching child to stand and up to provide entertainment from above.
customer_reviews.author: Kim Kelterborn

customer_reviews.title: Baby toys
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this my baby enjoys playing with the Animals
customer_reviews.author: Yesenia Ramos

customer_reviews.title: Baby and momma approved
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my granddaughter who loves it and her momma approves too! They Use it on the stroller and car seat.
customer_reviews.author: Alaskan Greenhouse Gardener

customer_reviews.title: Not super satisfied
customer_reviews.text: VERY small, much smaller than a regular arch, and pinchers on the end to keep in place are difficult to utilize properly. Look for a different one!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: VX-star Baby Travel Play Arch Stroller/Crib Accessory,Cloth Animmal Toy and Pram Activity Bar with Rattle/Squeak/Teethers(Stripe)
product_meta.description:
Features:
1.Material soft, comfortable, safe, non-toxic
2. This versatile activity toy is also ideal for encouraging baby to reach, pull and squeeze, which helps strengthen developing muscles
3. Multi colors encourage visual perception, Shake the toy will make sounds which can stimulate the baby's auditory nerve.
4.Animal design with vivid different colors make it easy to draw baby's attention. 
5.You can hang it around bed or BB bed or fences, also allows the baby holding a toy to play, training baby's hands coordination. 
Toys hanging around under the bed using a variety of different textures of fabric composed of a mixed variety of colors

High Quality: Every product is subject to strict quality inspection before it is sold.

Package includes: 
a baby Toy 

Note:Suggest range of application for the width of the crib:11.6-20.2 in/29.5-51.3 cm.
It is showed the length is 33.8 in/86 cm in the picture, as same as the toy's length, not mean the diameter is 33.8 in/86 cm when you bent.

Customer Service:
If you meet any issue, Please do not hesitate contact us, We will help you to solve it try our best.
feature_bullets: ♫ Cute shape design is very nice, these small animals are made of plush material.
♫ A travel arch with detachable, soft hanging toys to keep your child entertained while out and about. Ideal for strollers or bouncers.
♫ The zebra is squeaky toy, lion is with rattling ball and monkey is a music toy with teethers. All can be taken off to use on stroller, crib or car seat.

♫ 3 toys can be attached to the travel play arch; all swing when the stroller moves offering inviting visual stimulation for baby to gaze at; easily attaches to most prams, strollers, car seats and bouncers.
♫ Develop the ability of baby's tactile senses and hand-eye coordination naturally.Suggest range of application for the width of the crib:11.6-20.2 in/29.5-51.3 cm.
